chefmod:CookieJar.NAME: Cookie Jar
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 charge each time you climb a floor. #ychefmod:Hunger deals 1 more damage for each charge.

chefmod:OldKettle.NAME: Old Kettle
chefmod:OldKettle.FLAVOR: Actually, it gets along quite well with all other cookware.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Trusty Pot. The first attack card you draw each combat deals 5 additional damage.

chefmod:TrustyPot.NAME: Trusty Pot
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 5 #yBlock whenever you play the first card you draw in each combat.

chefmod:WoodenSpoon.NAME: Wooden Spoon
chefmod:WoodenSpoon.FLAVOR: Sturdy and well-used, this spoon has stirred many a meal.
